ProdtAttrMappedScope.name: ProdtAttrMappedScope
ProdtAttrMappedScope.description: Represents a junction between the product attribute scope and the product classification attribute.

AssocProdtAttrId.description: The product classification attribute or product attribute definition that's associated with the product attribute mapped scope.

IsSubcoverage.description: Indicates whether the product attribute is associated with the subcoverage level.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ParentMappedScopeId.description: The product attribute mapped scope that's associated with the product attribute to define the parent child relationship.

ProdtAttrScopeId.description: The product attribute scope that's associated with the product attribute.

BenefitName.description: Benefit name that's associated with the product attribute mapped scope as a subcoverage.
